Name: 名称
Description: 描述

Name: 熔岩之心
Description: 巨人族再次融入了大地
Description_en: The giant race has once again merged with the earth

Name: 星轨沙漏
Description: 观测者窥见了时间裂缝中的倒影
Description_en: The observer glimpsed reflections in the cracks of time

Name: 虚妄之瞳
Description: 看穿谎言者终将被真相灼伤
Description_en: Those who see through lies will ultimately be burned by truth

Name: 永霜王冠
Description: 寒冰女王的叹息冻结了背叛者的血脉
Description_en: The Ice Queen's sigh froze the bloodline of traitors

Name: 缚誓锁链
Description: 古老契约反噬了违背承诺的君王
Description_en: Ancient contracts devoured the king who broke his promises

Name: 辉月棱镜
Description: 圣堂骑士用其折射神谕的残光
Description_en: Temple knights use it to refract the dying light of divine oracles

Name: 熵核
Description: 地脉暴动的能量在晶体中嘶吼
Description_en: The energy of ley line upheavals roars within the crystal

Name: 命运纺锤
Description: 纺织女神剪断了凡人的生命线
Description_en: The weaving goddess severed the lifelines of mortals

Name: 影渊琥珀
Description: 吞噬光明的深渊凝结成实体
Description_en: The abyss that devours light has crystallized into physical form

Name: 龙语石碑
Description: 龙族将湮灭的文明刻入龙骨
Description_en: Dragons carved vanished civilizations into dragonbone

Name: 圣骸布
Description: 殉道者的血在布帛上燃烧千年
Description_en: The martyr's blood has burned on the cloth for a thousand years

Name: 混沌枝芽
Description: 世界树根系蔓延向无序的深渊
Description_en: The World Tree's roots spread toward the chaotic abyss

Name: 时之鳞
Description: 银龙鳞片记录了时间河流的涨落
Description_en: Silver dragon scales record the ebb and flow of time's river

Name: 心象罗盘
Description: 指向持有者最恐惧的回忆深处
Description_en: Points toward the depths of the holder's most feared memories

Name: 冥河船票
Description: 摆渡人只接受灵魂作为船资
Description_en: The ferryman accepts only souls as passage fare

Name: 天穹齿轮
Description: 机械之神遗落的精密神性
Description_en: Precise divinity left behind by the god of machines

Name: 蚀日黑钻
Description: 日蚀时陨落的星辰核心
Description_en: The stellar core that fell during a solar eclipse

Name: 歌者之血
Description: 人鱼族用歌声封印了海啸
Description_en: The merfolk sealed the tsunami with their songs

Name: 荒原号角
Description: 吹响时唤醒地壳下的泰坦
Description_en: When blown, awakens the titans beneath the earth's crust

Name: 真理砝码
Description: 天平两端称量谎言与疯狂
Description_en: The scales weigh lies and madness on both ends

Name: 绯红契约
Description: 血族公爵签署的致命盟约
Description_en: A deadly alliance signed by the vampire duke

Name: 空想透镜
Description: 将梦境折射为可触摸的实体
Description_en: Refracts dreams into tangible entities

Name: 寂灭尘埃
Description: 诸神黄昏战役的灰烬仍有余温
Description_en: Ashes from the Ragnarök battle still retain their warmth

Name: 潮汐圣杯
Description: 盛满月海潮汐的液态月光
Description_en: Filled with liquid moonlight from lunar sea tides

Name: 荆棘王玺
Description: 初代精灵王冠上的诅咒冠冕
Description_en: The cursed diadem from the first elven king's crown

Name: 悖论魔方
Description: 六个面同时存在又相互否定
Description_en: Six faces that simultaneously exist yet negate each other

Name: 万物之基-灾
Description: 灾之起源
Description_en: Origin of Calamity

Name: 万物之基-矩
Description: 矩之起源
Description_en: Origin of Order

Name: 万物之基-宙
Description: 宙之起源
Description_en: Origin of Cosmos

Name: 万物之基-灵
Description: 灵之起源
Description_en: Origin of Spirit
